name: Orthworm
description: The Earthworm Pokémon. When attacked, this Pokémon will wield the tendrils on its body like fists and pelt the opponent with a storm of punches.

abilities.name: Earth Eater
abilities.description: This Pokémon takes no damage from ground-type attacks. Instead, half of any ground damage done is absorbed, restoring the Pokémon's HP.

abilities.name: Sand Veil
abilities.description: This Pokémon is immune to Sandstorm damage. In addition, its AC increases by 2 in desert terrain, or during a Sandstorm.
